      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:

      • generateSceleton

        public static void generateSceleton(java.lang.String path,
                    int zoom,
                    double step,
                    int sampling,
                    int pushingFactor,
                    int iteration,
                    int distanceTolerance,
                    int rootTolerance)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generates the skeleton of a model
        Parameters:
        path - path to file
        zoom - multiplies coordinates by zoom
        step - the step of convergence toward local minimum
        sampling - rerify of the skeleton
        pushingFactor - initial pushing toward inner S
        iteration - the number of iteration threshold
        distanceTolerance - for merging nodes
        rootTolerance - for merging final nodes
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if can't open the file

      • generateBoneSystem

        public static void generateBoneSystem()
        Generates the hierarchy bone system. If bones are not connected it may be stuck in inf loop

        public static void printKeyInfo()
        Prints animation controls
